text:
The bug is that when you click on one of the package links in the top left 
corner frame, the other 2 frames refresh (which is correct), but then if you 
click on the 'Home' link, only the right frame refreshes (which is incorrect).

Solution:
The junitreport task uses the following xsl document: junit-frames.xsl which 
should include an 'onload' attribute on the body tag for the 'overview-
summary.html' generated file.

Thanks
Vijay
